summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ACQUA water delivery application. Backend APIs fully functional (12/13 tests passed). Frontend registration, login, dashboards, and core features working correctly. Minor session timeout issue identified.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Low - security behavior is correct, just different status code

session_management.issue: Session expires requiring re-login after period of inactivity
session_management.impact: Normal behavior but may affect user experience during testing

passed_tests: Landing page loads with ACQUA branding and water theme
New order modal opens and functions
Backend API endpoints: auth/login, auth/register, auth/me
Customer and admin role-based access control
